snippet: The minister, Joaquim Levy, had been in charge of spearheading austerity measures and returning the country to fiscal and economic health.
abstract: Brazilian president Dilma Rousseff replaces finance minister Joaquim Levy with Nelson Barbosa, country's planning minister, as economy continues to deteriorate.
lead_paragraph: The minister, Joaquim Levy, had been in charge of spearheading austerity measures and returning the country to fiscal and economic health.

headline.print_headline: The Americas; Brazil: Finance Minister Replaced
